reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: The project will research the development of the New Energy Vehicle industry in China

description.narrative: This project is designed to respond to high Chinese demand for collaboration on New Energy Vehicle (NEV) policies, research and commercial opportunities. Via research and engagement, the project will define NEV activities for recommended implementation in the Clean Technology strand under the Energy/Low Carbon pillar of a China prosperity programme. The programme will match China's specific reform needs with energy and low carbon sector strengths, reducing global emissions by accelerating China's energy transition.
